channel.title: Pandas on Nathaniel Pyle
channel.description: Recent content in Pandas on Nathaniel Pyle

item.title: Titanic Survival Project
item.description: This project explores Titanic survival patterns using EDA and visualisations, focusing on age, class, fare, and sex.

item.title: Palmer Penguin Dataset
item.description: This project involved Exploratory Data Analysis and visualisation of the Palmer Penguins dataset using Python libraries including Pandas, Matplotlib, and Seaborn.
